measuretools.binary_to_nonbinary¶

abjad.tools.measuretools.binary_to_nonbinary(measure, new_denominator_factor)¶
Make binary measure into equivalent nonbinary measure. New denominator factor like clever form of 1: 3/3 or 5/5 or 7/7, etc. Prolated duration of measure exactly same before and after. Derive new measure multiplier and scale contents. Then pick best meter. This is a special case of scale_and_remeter.

Previous topic

measuretools.beam_together

Next topic

measuretools.color_nonbinary
